label: Prone
short_description: The front of the body faces the resistance or the floor. Increases engagement of the posterior chain stabilizers.

label: Supine
short_description: The back of the body faces the resistance or the floor. Common for pressing and core-lifting movements.

label: Side-Lying
short_description: The side of the body faces the floor or resistance. Isolates lateral stabilizers like the glute medius and obliques.
